children.text: Can only cancel when the attack connects

actions.text: The Hitstun is the number of frames the opponent cant act. Divided by 60 cause the game runs at 60 FPS

children.text: Direction must be specified to push opposite direction when facing left

actions.text: Blockstun is the amount of time the player blocking is unable to act for

children.text: If the player is already launched the strength of the launcher is reduced to prevent infinite combos
If the player is not already launched it launches higher

actions.text: Making launch a state then allows for different interactions with hitboxes in the state

children.text: If the player is already launched the strength of the launcher is reduced to prevent infinite combos
If the player is not already launched it launches higher

actions.text: Making launch a state then allows for different interactions with hitboxes in the state

children.text: Changing density makes the launched character fly higher without causing gravity issues
Split into two different functions so because the using playerbox family causes issues. if one player is facing right the other is facing left and it sets the angle backwards

Same function for both players. Changes the player variable based on who does the attack and therefore will only spawn on correct player and do damage to oponent. Probably could have been done for hitbox functions but is too annoying to change now

Changed to get rid of block boxes and allows for blocking at any time. Playtesters suggested making it more clear that you were blocking as when the lockboxes disappeared on recovery the player was no longer blocking.

Stops blocking if no longer holding down back. May not make a difference but just for sure. Changed to S to make it more clear for people not used to fighting games. Also stops weirdness of walking back as soon as a move ends
Restrictions on all moves so that you are not able to use moves during hit or blockstun
5H activates when not holding forward and pressing H. Dependent on which direction the character is facing
Allows for player to cancel into another normal when they hit the other player. Adding previous state and individual cancel functions allows me to control which moves are cancelable into each other
Calls the function when the frame tag is active because if called when the button is pressed theframe tag is not active and the hitbox wouldn't spawn properly
Fixes a bug where you would be unable to move if you did a jump kick too low to the ground
Sets Move_Active to true when any move is running in order to stop movement while doing a move and mashing

events.text: Code is the same for P2

children.text: 5H activates when not holding forward and pressing H. Dependent on which direction the character is facing
Allows for player to cancel into another normal when they hit the other player. Adding previous state and individual cancel functions allows me to control which moves are cancelable into each other
Fixes a bug where you would be unable to move if you did a jump kick too low to the ground

events.text: Prevents bug where you would get frozen if you got hit out of a move
